mapper.select: select s_seq,s_title,s_contents,s_writer,s_viewcount,s_writingtime, s_image1 as imagename1, s_image2 as imagename2, s_image2 as imagename2, s_image3 as imagename3,s_like from styletab

select s_seq,s_title,s_contents,s_writer,s_viewcount,s_writingtime, s_image1 as imagename1, s_image2 as imagename2, s_image2 as imagename2 ,s_image3 as imagename3, s_like from styletab order by s_seq desc limit #{limit}, 16

select s_seq,s_title,s_contents,s_writer,s_viewcount,s_writingtime, s_image1 as imagename1, s_image2 as imagename2, s_image2 as imagename2, s_image3 as imagename3, s_like from styletab order by s_like desc limit #{limit}, 16
mapper.insert: insert into styletab(s_title, s_contents, s_writer, s_image1, s_image2, s_image3, p_name1) values(#{s_title}, #{s_contents}, #{s_writer}, #{imagename1},#{imagename2},#{imagename3},#{p_name1})
mapper.select: select s_like from styletab where s_seq=#{s_seq}
select s_seq,s_title,s_contents,s_writer,s_viewcount,s_writingtime,p_name1, s_image1 as imagename1, s_image2 as imagename2, s_image3 as imagename3, s_like from styletab where s_seq=#{s_seq}

select p_id,p_name,p_sex,p_brand,p_color,p_price,p_stock,p_contents,p_image1,p_image2,p_image3,p_like,p_thumb from product inner join styletab on product.p_name = styletab.p_name1 where product.p_name = #{p_name1};
mapper.update: update styletab set s_title = #{s_title}, s_contents=#{s_contents} where s_seq=#{s_seq}
update styletab set s_viewcount=s_viewcount+1 where s_seq=#{s_seq}
mapper.select: select count(*) from boardlike where s_seq = #{s_seq} and m_id=#{m_id}
mapper.update: update boardlike set likeCheck = 1 where s_seq = #{s_seq} and m_id = #{m_id}
update boardlike set likeCheck = 0 where s_seq = #{s_seq} and m_id = #{m_id}
mapper.delete: delete from boardlike where s_seq = #{s_seq} and m_id = #{m_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from boardlike where m_id = #{m_id} and s_seq = #{s_seq}
select * from product inner join category on category.category_id = product.category_id where product.category_id = 1 order by p_name;
